clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Caerulein is used in the treatment of paralytic ileus and as diagnostic aid in pancreatic malfunction

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Caerulein is a specific decapeptide similar in action and composition to the natural gastrointestinal peptide hormone cholecystokinin that stimulates gastric biliary and pancreatic secretion It also exerts stimulatory actions on certain smooth muscles
